attributes.action: fight to stop crupt social services taking are children
attributes.additional_details: i would like the local MP/Governmant to look at how there social services train there social worker this is to stop crupt social taking children from loving family without no proof this must stop just so they can get there bonuses and brag to your face in court and make them train for at least 7 years before there a social worker and not under 2 years qualified i have had my son ripped away without no proof these laws need to change

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Misconduct and misuse of Every Child Matters Act. The victimisation of parents by social services anpsychological impact on children placed in care.

Created by: Janine Norton

Closing: 17/02/15
